snippet: On Monday, Weil plans to announce that it has hired Andrew Wilkinson as the newest high-profile member of the firm’s vaunted corporate restructuring and bankruptcy practice, serving as a partner in the London office.
abstract: On Monday, Weil plans to announce that it has hired Andrew Wilkinson as the newest high-profile member of the firm’s vaunted corporate restructuring and bankruptcy practice, serving as a partner in the London office.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Weil Hires Senior Goldman Bankruptcy Specialist for London Office
